title: Mathematics Project-Based Educational Curriculum for Strengthening Online Self-Directed Learning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A course focused on helping prospective teachers develop self-directed learning strategies for math education, emphasizing the use of MOOCs and OER materials.

learning_goals: Learners can self-directly plan and execute math projects in an online environment
Learners can systematically monitor and adjust learning progress using digital tools
Learners improve their ability to resolve learning challenges through peer feedback and online communities

Learners can analyze three math-related OCW/MOOC contents (e.g., MIT OpenCourseWare, Coursera) to design a 5-step self-directed learning strategy (goal setting, material selection, execution, evaluation, improvement) and apply it to actual lesson design over four weeks to achieve 4 or higher on a learner satisfaction survey (5-point scale).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
